get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of operators along with their latest quorum stakes, metadata, and statistics about the operators.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of operators per page.

200.description: Successful response containing operator data, metadata, and statistics.

operatorId.description: The unique ID of the operator.

socket.description: The socket associated with the operator.

status.description: The status of the operator (active or not).

ejected.description: Indicates if the operator has been ejected.

stake.description: The stake amount for the operator in the quorum.

quorumStakes.description: An array of quorum stakes for the operator.

totalStake.description: The total stake of the operator across all quorums.

data.description: A list of operators with their respective details and quorum stakes.

limit.description: The number of operators per page.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages for the query.

hasMore.description: Indicates if more pages are available.

totalOperators.description: The total number of operators in the system.

totalStake.description: The total stake across all operators.

statistics.description: Summary statistics about the operators and their stakes.

meta.description: Metadata about the paginated response and additional statistics.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific operator, including quorum-related data and calculated statistics.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

parameters.name: operator
parameters.description: The unique address of the operator to fetch details for.

200.description: Successful response containing operator details and statistics.

operatorId.description: The unique ID of the operator.

socket.description: The socket associated with the operator.

status.description: The status of the operator (active or not).

ejected.description: Indicates if the operator has been ejected.

blockNumber.description: The block number of the operator's latest state.

quorumNumber.description: The quorum number associated with the operator.

operatorIndex.description: The index of the operator in the quorum.

stake.description: The stake amount of the operator in the quorum.

activeBatchIds.description: List of active batch IDs for the operator in the quorum.

entryBatchIds.description: List of entry batch IDs for the operator in the quorum.

exitBatchIds.description: List of exit batch IDs for the operator in the quorum.

entryTimestamps.description: List of entry timestamps for the operator in the quorum.

exitTimestamps.description: List of exit timestamps for the operator in the quorum.

quorums.description: A list of quorum-related details for the operator.

totalQuorums.description: The total number of quorums the operator is part of.

activeQuorums.description: The number of active quorums for the operator.

totalStake.description: The total stake of the operator across all quorums.

isActive.description: Indicates if the operator is active and not ejected.

get.description: Retrieves a list of operators filtered by their status, with pagination and aggregated statistics.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the operators to filter by.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per page for pagination.

200.description: Successful response containing operators data with metadata and statistics.

operatorId.description: The unique ID of the operator.

socket.description: The socket associated with the operator.

ejected.description: Indicates if the operator has been ejected.

quorumNumber.description: The quorum number associated with the operator.

stake.description: The stake amount of the operator in the quorum.

quorumStakes.description: A list of quorum-related stakes for the operator.

totalStake.description: The total stake of the operator across all quorums.

data.description: The list of operators matching the query parameters.

total.description: The total number of operators matching the status.

status.description: The status filter applied to the operators.

limit.description: The number of items per page.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages available.

hasMore.description: Indicates if there are more pages available.

totalStake.description: The total stake across all operators.

meta.description: Metadata and statistics about the query result.

get.description: Retrieves a list of operators filtered by their ejection status, with pagination and aggregated statistics.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

parameters.name: ejected
parameters.description: The ejection status of the operators to filter by. `true` for ejected operators, `false` for non-ejected.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per page for pagination.

200.description: Successful response containing operators data with metadata and statistics.

operatorId.description: The unique ID of the operator.

socket.description: The socket associated with the operator.

ejected.description: Indicates if the operator has been ejected.

quorumNumber.description: The quorum number associated with the operator.

stake.description: The stake amount of the operator in the quorum.

quorumStakes.description: A list of quorum-related stakes for the operator.

totalStake.description: The total stake of the operator across all quorums.

data.description: The list of operators matching the query parameters.

total.description: The total number of operators matching the ejection status.

status.description: The ejection status filter applied to the operators.

limit.description: The number of items per page.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages available.

hasMore.description: Indicates if there are more pages available.

totalStake.description: The total stake across all operators.

meta.description: Metadata and statistics about the query result.

get.description: Fetches distinct non-signed batch IDs associated with a specific operator, filtered by optional time and block ranges, with pagination.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

parameters.name: operator
parameters.description: The unique address of the operator to filter batches for.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per page for pagination.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The start timestamp for filtering batches.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The end timestamp for filtering batches.

parameters.name: startBlock
parameters.description: The starting block number for filtering batches.

parameters.name: endBlock
parameters.description: The ending block number for filtering batches.

200.description: Successful response containing distinct batch data with metadata.

batchId.description: The unique ID of the batch.

blockTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

blockNumber.description: The block number associated with the batch.

data.description: The list of distinct batches matching the query parameters.

total.description: The total number of distinct batches matching the filters.

limit.description: The number of items per page.

operatorId.description: The operator ID filter applied to the query.

start.description: The earliest timestamp in the result set.

end.description: The latest timestamp in the result set.

timeRange.description: The range of timestamps covered in the result set.

start.description: The lowest block number in the result set.

end.description: The highest block number in the result set.

blockRange.description: The range of block numbers covered in the result set.

filters.description: The filters applied to the query.

meta.description: Metadata about the query result and applied filters.

get.description: Retrieves a list of operators who have been non-signers with optional time and block-based filtering

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time for filtering non-signing events

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time for filtering non-signing events

parameters.name: startBlock
parameters.description: Starting block number for filtering non-signing events

parameters.name: endBlock
parameters.description: Ending block number for filtering non-signing events

parameters.name: lastNBatches
parameters.description: Number of most recent batches to retrieve if no other filters are applied

200.description: Successful response with non-signing operators data

missedBatchCount.description: Number of batches missed by the operator

firstMissedAt.description: Timestamp of the first missed batch

lastMissedAt.description: Timestamp of the last missed batch

firstMissedBlock.description: First block number where a batch was missed

lastMissedBlock.description: Last block number where a batch was missed

filteredBatchCount.description: Number of batches considered in the query

totalOperators.description: Total number of operators with missed batches

averageMissedBatchesPerOperator.description: Average number of missed batches per operator

mostMissedBatches.description: Highest number of missed batches by a single operator

leastMissedBatches.description: Lowest number of missed batches by a single operator

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

schema.description: The unique address of the operator.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: A specific action type to filter activities.

200.description: Successful response with operator activity data

quorumNumber.description: The quorum number associated with the action.

action.description: The action performed by the operator.

stake.description: The stake of operator in the quorum.

batchId.description: The batch identifier associated with the action.

transactionHash.description: The transaction hash of the action.

blockTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the block in which the action occurred.

blockNumber.description: The block number in which the action occurred.

total.description: The total number of activities matching the filters.

limit.description: The number of records per page.

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on the provided limit.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether there are more results available on the next page.

additionalProperties.description: The count of activities per action type.
